resources.string: \u25CF Test includes Questions on Traffic Signage and Rules of Traffic
\u25CF 8 Questions will be there, You must answer 4 of them correct to Pass the Test
1). You can overtake a Vehicle in front through...
5). A place where parking is not prohibited
7). Minimum age for receiving learning license of two wheeler is 16, True or False?
You can\'t go back at this stage
